alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Ford; Gray; Hodgeman; Ness; Pawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 2:44AM CDT until April 23 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ford County in southwestern Kansas... Southeastern Ness County in west central Kansas... Hodgeman County in southwestern Kansas... Pawnee County in south central Kansas... Northeastern Gray County in southwestern Kansas... Edwards County in south central Kansas... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 244 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles south of Ness City to 6 miles southwest of Cimarron, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Howell, Dodge City, Burdett, Wright, Ft. Dodge, Spearville, Ash Valley, Windhorst, Bellefont and Offerle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Edwards; Ford; Gray; Hodgeman; Ness; Pawnee
